acceptance-criteria.criterion: Capability Center screen (settings → capabilities) surfaces current capability status, blockers, and CTAs for `publish`, `collect_payments`, and `fulfill_orders`. [Source: docs/tech-spec-epic-2.md#story-21-capability-enablement-request-flow]

Inline prompts in publish, checkout, and fulfillment flows detect missing capability and open the guided checklist modal with context (draft ID, entry point). [Source: docs/tech-spec-epic-2.md#story-21-capability-enablement-request-flow]

Submitting a request calls `POST /capabilities/request`, persists contextual metadata, and updates UI state to in-progress with polling backoff. Idempotent retries do not create duplicate requests. [Source: docs/tech-spec-epic-2.md#api-endpoints]

Audit event `capability.requested` is emitted with capability type, entry point, and device fingerprint, and is visible on the capability operations dashboard. [Source: docs/tech-spec-epic-2.md#8-implementation-guide]

Analytics event `capability_request_submitted` is recorded with capability type, entry point, and success/failure result. [Source: docs/tech-spec-epic-2.md#story-21-capability-enablement-request-flow]

task.description: Create `CapabilityCenterPage` listing capability cards with status badges and CTA buttons.
Implement `CapabilityCenterBloc` fetching `GET /capabilities/status` on init, handling poll refreshes, and emitting analytics.
Add localization strings for capability statuses (`Inactive`, `In Review`, `Ready`, `Blocked`).
Implement `CapabilityRepository` in core package with `fetchStatus()`, `requestCapability()`, and `subscribeToUpdates()` methods.
Add `CapabilityService` for API calls, ensuring exponential backoff polling and HTTP retry policies.
Emit domain event `CapabilityRequested` for analytics bus.
Implement `CapabilityEndpoint.requestCapability` verifying prerequisites, creating/refreshing `capability_requests`, and publishing audit events.
Enforce unique `(user_id, capability)` constraint and idempotency tokens.
Update OpenAPI/Client generation and regenerate Serverpod client.
Add Grafana panel for request volume, approval rate, and blocker distribution.
Write widget + bloc tests for capability center states and inline prompts.
Author integration test covering request submission → status polling → unlock event.
Define semantic light and dark palettes with centralized theme extension (`packages/shared/theme/color_palette.dart`).
Publish typography scales and spacing tokens with unit tests guarding accessors (`packages/shared/theme/typography.dart`, `spacing.dart`).
Update `docs/architecture/coding-standards.md` with token usage guidance and migration examples for legacy widgets.
Ensure splash and placeholder feed screens consume tokens only (no hard-coded colors/spacing) and validate light/dark switching.
